ground_truth_answer: Workflow workers handle and guide facility procedures, focusing on tasks like network setup and maintenance, security tools furnishing, and developing plans and procedures. They also conduct training workshops and ensure policy compliance. On the other hand, incident responders, as part of the SOC team, act as first responders during security incidents, performing actions like shutting down endpoints, terminating harmful processes, and restoring systems after an incident.
